title: Looking for Jungle and Mid Plat +
body:
Hi am looking to make a plat + serious team to start this week, we need subs a mid and jungle. All players should preferably 18+ but if you are mature we can let u in.
I myself will be managing/coaching as I want to play as little as possible because I no longer enjoy playing, but still enjoy the game, as we start out I will be filling roles necessary and when all roles are filled I'll be moving to managing/coaching.

I am looking for this to be an active team playing at a minimum 3 days per week. Also we will be using Team-speak for our voice coms, I plan to try another program out to compare in a couple of weeks time, but for now it will be Team-speak.

Could you please fill out this form if you would like to trial or add me in game and send me the completed form.

Name:
IRL first name:
Age:
State:
Top two roles:
Top 4 champions in each of those roles:
Rank:
Availability:

Good luck and will be looking forward to hearing from you soon.
~zPONYv~

replies.body:
Hey guys, 

Iceagle
Jamison
20 
QLD
Mid and JG in that order,
Mid: Anivia, Lux, Twisted Fate, Ahri in that order
JG: Sejuani, Skarner, Nidalee, Vi, (would like to point out that i have 15 level 5 champions that exceed the top 4 list of each role that you requested.)
Diamond 5, had experience in many ranked teams including playing 6 months in a challenger team, 1 year in a gold team and 8 months in a platinum team.

Availability: I would like to give time to work my shifts at work and attend class at university, also band rehearsals. I am available to play monday during the day, and then i have class from 4pm - 6pm, available to play onwards after 7:00pm, same with tuesdays, wednesday I cannot play during the day or evening until after 10:00pm, Thursday I have work that starts at 1:00pm that i can start playing after 7:00pm, but would like an early night because i have work the next day from 5:30am to 1:30pm and don't want to be on tilt from being tired. Saturdays I work from 7:30am to 1:30 pm and can start playing from 2:00pm onwards. Sunday free all day. 

During the holiday break I can play all day monday - wednesday, and then I have the same working shifts for the other 3 days.
